title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Plan your flight - using Navigraph
description:
In this how to we are going to look how you can use Navigraph to plan your flights for MSFS 2020. Navigraph is one of the vendors which is offering tools for MSFS 2020 which specifically focusses on flight maps and flight planning. In this video I will show you the different options available to schedule a flight and eventually load the flight plan in MSFS 2020.

0:00 title screen
0:10 create the flight plan in MSFS 2020
1:30 Navigraph Charts overview
2:25 create a flight plan using Navigraph Charts manually
9:15 transferring the flight plan to MSFS 2020
14:23 create a flight plan using Navigraph Charts using Simbrief
17:29 loading the flight plan in the Boeing 78XH addon
23:18 loading the flgith plan in the A32NX addon
